title: Carrot
info: The Carrot summons an exclusive Bunny Pet that is only available in the Terraria Collector's Edition. The color of the bunny's fur is defined by the shirt color chosen for the character at the point of their creation.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons a pet bunny
Rarity03*
Research1 required
